data.caption: Intimation Of Book Closure And Holding Of 33Rd Annual General Meeting Of The Company Through VC/ OAVM
data.news_body:
In terms of Regulation 30 and other applicable regulations of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 and listing regulations as amended and in accordance with the relevant circulars issued by SEBI MCA we wish to inform you that the 33rd Annual General Meeting of the Company is scheduled to be held on 25th September 2025 through Video Conferencing and other Audio Visual Means (OAVM).

Pursuant to Regulation 42 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 the register of Members and share transfer books will remain closed from Friday 19th September 2025 to 25th September 2025 for the purpose of holding the 33rd Annual General Meeting of the Company.
The Voting period will begin on 22nd September 2025 (9.00 AM IST) and end on 24th September 2025 (05.00 PM IST). During this period shareholders of the Company holding shares either in physical form or demat form as on the cut-off date i.e. Friday 19th September 2025 may cast their vote electronically.  

This is for your information and record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Meeting Updates
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you the Board of Director of M/s Sindhu Trade Links Limited in its ongoing efforts of diversify and expand into strategic and future critical sectors has approved a long-term growth strategy focused on critical minerals and metals building upon the National Critical Mineral Mission of India and the increasing demand for critical minerals and metals across the globe fueled by infrastructure expansion. The company will explore the potential investment and acquisition opportunities in Lithium Mining and Rare Earth Element mining sector both in India and Overseas.
The Company intends to pursue acquisition of mine in Indonesia in integrated Infrastructure with a proven track record greenfield mines along-with associated infrastructure.

data.caption:
Board Meeting Outcome for Sub: Sindhu Trade Links Limited
Outcome Of The Board Meeting Under Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body:
1. Considered and approved to pursue a long-term growth strategy focused on critical minerals and metals building upon the National Critical Mineral Mission of India and the increasing demand for critical minerals and metals across the globe fueled by infrastructure expansion. The company will explore the potential investment and acquisition opportunities in the Lithium Mining and rare Earth Element (REE) mining sectors both in India and Overseas and mining of metals such as Iron Ore which are critical for India and Global Infrastructure Expansion.
2. Considered and approved to pursue acquisition of mines in Indonesia with integrated infrastructure with the proven track record of greenfield mines alongwith associated infrastructures.
3. Considered the spontaneous matter of Solar power project and its investment by the Company in future course. 
4. Considered and Approved the Shifting of Corporate Office to 1502 15th Floor Tower A Signature Tower Sector - 30 Gurugram - 122003
